scripts.start:all: NODE_ENV=production cd server && nodemon index.js & cd client && npm run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NODE_ENV=production cd client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test cd client && npm test --watchAll && cd ../server && npm test
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test cd client && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false && codecov && cd ../server && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false && codecov
scripts.gap: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
